nodes.bodyText: isn't this useful for all other adapters as well, i.e. doesn't it make sense to pull it up into MapBasedTelemetryExecutionContext?
Currently that doesn't look useful. But it might be when doing the refactorings concerning the *TenantObjectWithIdProvider classes.
I guess it would be good to define constants for these keys as they are used across different classes
